definition: to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing

sentences.english: Ghana has become the first African team to win the Under-20 World Cup.
sentences.chinese: 迦纳成为首个赢得20岁以下世界杯的足球队。

sentences.english: She has jewelry made from shells and rolls of the country's traditional Kente cloth.
sentences.chinese: 她还出售用贝壳制作的珠宝和迦纳传统的彩色布料。

sentences.english: Ghana was colonized as the Gold Coast by the British.
sentences.chinese: 迦纳曾被英国作为黄金海岸，是其殖民地。
